com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.dialog.v1

Class DialogService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.dialog.v1.DialogService
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class DialogService
extends WatsonService
    The Dialog service was deprecated on August 15, 2016, existing instances of the service will continue to function until August 9, 2017. Please use ConversationService
